nodes.text: The Alzar system was a star system located in the Thanium sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Alzar, the homeworld of the sentient Alzarian species.

The Alzar system first appeared, albeit unidentified, in Ewoks 10, the tenth issue of the Ewoks comic series published by Star Comics, an imprint of Marvel Comics, which was first published on October 1, 1986. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square R-6.
